responsibilities.title: Staff Developer - Digital Innovation Unit
responsibilities.description: Leading initiatives bridging development and R&D teams, including establishing the AI Integration & Adoption Unit. Providing strategic guidance and technical support to product engineering teams.
keyResponsibilities: Led initiatives bridging development and R&D teams
Transformed concepts into MVPs (iHealth, Quality Mate, Business AI)
Provided strategic guidance to product engineering teams
Integrated AI agents and automated processes
achievements: Successfully established AI Integration & Adoption Unit

responsibilities.title: Technical Leadership - Frontend Architecture
responsibilities.description: Leading frontend architecture design and establishing best practices across product engineering teams. Mentoring developers and promoting quality standards.
keyResponsibilities: Guided frontend architecture design and implementation
Established frontend development standards and best practices
Mentored team members on modern development practices
Conducted code reviews and quality assessments
Led technical decision-making for frontend technologies
achievements: Established design system and component library
Successfully trained and mentored multiple developers

responsibilities.title: Team Leader - ITI eLearning Track
responsibilities.description: Led team of trainees in eLearning Technologies Specialist Track during intensive 9-month training program.
keyResponsibilities: Led team of trainees as Team Leader
Coordinated instructional design and content development projects
Facilitated team collaboration and project execution
achievements: Successfully completed training program with Very Good grade
Led team to successful project completions
